body:
hi, this forum thread is dedicated to computer know it all's. Thanks. 

ok, so for the past few days my internet has been HORRIBLE! this is according to mc servers. 

this is hard to explain so keep with me here.... 

Everytime i join a server, i just freeze, i break blocks in the lobby, nothing happens. i eventually get kicked. This happens of every server i join besides australian hosted mcgamer.

Please help... i have a belief that this isn't my internet due to it doing fine on youtube and downloading stuff, my internet is the same now from when i played avicus, even faster tho.. 

If you want screenshots please ask me.

BUMP ME WHEN REPLYING SO I GET ALERTS!!!!

btw am australian

Oh by the way, the book isn't suppose to open, it's broken lol.
